item.title: James Lovell, the steady astronaut who brought Apollo 13 home safely, has died
item.description: Lovell was the first person to fly to the Moon twice.

item.title: Tom Hanks Pays Tribute to ‘Apollo 13’ Astronaut Jim Lovell: “Godspeed You, on This Next Voyage”
item.description: The actor portrayed the leader of the mission to the moon in the 1995 film.

item.title: Tom Hanks Honors Astronaut Jim Lovell, Who He Portrayed in ‘Apollo 13’: ‘God Speed You, on This Next Voyage’
item.description: Tom Hanks has shared a tribute to James A. Lovell, the astronaut he portrayed in the 1995 feature “Apollo 13.” Lovell died Thursday at the age of 97. The film, directed by Ron Howard, star

item.title: ‘Apollo 13’ Sets Imax Rerelease for 30th Anniversary- Film News in Brief
item.description: Universal Pictures is celebrating the 30th anniversary of “Apollo 13” by rereleasing the groundbreaking space-drama in Imax. The full-length theatrical version of the Oscar-nominated film will return

item.title: ‘Apollo 13’ Sets Imax Rerelease for 30th Anniversary- Film News in Brief
item.description: Universal Pictures is celebrating the 30th anniversary of “Apollo 13” by rereleasing the groundbreaking space-drama in Imax. The full-length theatrical version of the Oscar-nominated film will return
